metadata.title: CVE-2024-0750 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A bug in popup notifications delay calculation could have made it possiblefor an attacker to trick a user into granting permissions. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird <115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
